name: Kytis

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally HP in the Arena by 33%.

skills.name: Soul Reaper
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has an 85% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns if the target has a [Continuous Heal] buff.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Spikes
skills.raw_description:
Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 2 turns, then attacks 4 times at random. The attacks will be critical if the target has a [Continuous Heal] buff.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Bleeding Wounds
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies 2 times. Damage increases according to the amount of HP this Champion has lost. Champion has lost 50% of their HP.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
